name: token-usage-tracker
description: Real-time token usage tracking system for Claude Sonnet 4.5

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist backend/cdk.out
